faq.question: How many team members can I invite?
What is the maximum file upload size?
faq.answer: No more than 2GB. All files in your account must fit your allotted storage space.

faq.question: How do I reset my password?
faq.answer: Go to the sign-in-page and click on 'Forgot password'.

faq.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
faq.answer: Yes, open the Settings app, tap 'Subscriptions' and select 'Cancel Subscription'.

faq.question: Do you provide additional support?
faq.answer: Of course, if you are interested, please use the phone number found in our main website.
